author: Warhammer
description:
Painting Fulgrim, Primarch of the Emperor’s Children in All His Indulgent Glory!

Adam has laid his soul bare to paint Fulgrim in all his glory. Watch along as Adam takes on painting the ultimate hobby project for the servants of Slaanesh!

Paint List:

Base

Abaddon Black
Bugmans Glow
Corax White
Corvus Black
Grey Seer
Ionrach Skin
Incubi Darkness
Iron Warriors
Mechanicus Standard Grey
Naggaroth Night
Screamer Pink
Stegadon Scale Green
Rakarth Flesh
Retributor Armour
Runelord Brass

Layer

Administratum Grey
Baharroth Blue
Deepkin Flesh
Dorn Yellow
Emperor’s Children
Fire Dragon Bright
Fulgrim Pink
Kislev Flesh
Pallid Wych Flesh
Pink Horror
Runefang Steel
Slaanesh Grey
Sotek Green
Stormhost Silver
White Scar

Shade

Nuln Oil

Contrast

Aethermatic Blue
Blood Angels Red
Doomfire Magenta
Leviathan Purple
Magos Purple
Terradon Turquoise
Volupus Pink

Technical 

Contrast Medium
Lahmian Medium

Brushes

Small Base
Small Layer
Medium Layer
Medium Shade Brush
Small Dry Brush
